attachments.title: Add the way to get search stat information when 'set shortmess-=S' by tyru · Pull Request #4446 · vim/vim
attachments.text: As of 8.1.1270, vim can show current match position and count like [1/20] at command-line. It is useful but cannot get the status from Vim script, without using execute(&#39;:unsilent :norm! n&#39;...

patch 8.1.2044: no easy way to process postponed work

Problem:    No easy way to process postponed work. (Paul Jolly)
Solution:   Add the SafeState autocommand event.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2044: no easy way to process postponed work
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.2044: no easy way to process postponed work

Problem:    No easy way to process postponed work. (Paul Jolly)
Solution:   Add the SafeState autocommand event.

patch 8.1.2047: cannot check the current state

Problem:    Cannot check the current state.
Solution:   Add the state() function.

attachments.text:
patch 8.1.2047: cannot check the current state

Problem:    Cannot check the current state.
Solution:   Add the state() function.

text:
state() はこれ何を返すのか help 見てもよく分かんないな。
だいたい空文字かそうでないかで判定するだろうみたいな事書かれてるけどそれだったら boolean でいいんだよな。
テストのために内部的な状態を返すために文字列にしたんかな。
便利そうなので~悪用~便利するために help に {what} のそれぞれ何を表すか書いてほしい :thinking_vim:
{what} 省略可能っぽいけど省略されたらどうなるのか書いてないな (スマホなのでコード見る気が起きない)
そもそも追加された経緯がよく分かってない
